snippet: Economists say the claims and counterclaims on job creation or job destruction are often misleading.
abstract: Washington is applying a new yardstick when judging the merits of federal laws; instead of looking at their costs or savings, question is whether they will create or destroy jobs; economists see misleading claims and counterclaims.
lead_paragraph: Economists say the claims and counterclaims on job creation or job destruction are often misleading.

headline.seo: New Laws Evaluated by Job-Creation Potential
headline.main: New Laws Now Evaluated by Job Creation
headline.print_headline: New Laws Now Evaluated by Job Creation
